name: FCEUX 2 Movie Capture File
summary: An FM2 file contains information in the FCEUX Movie Capture Format (FM2). It stores records of buttons pushed during gameplay in plain text and binary format, along with metadata , such as the movie file format and the version of the emulator that created the FM2 file. FM2 files replaced the FCM movie format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
